name: Bomsy
description: Bomsy is a fast, aim-based, multiplayer arena brawler with destructible maps. The aim of the game is to take out your opponents by lobbing bombs at them and wreaking havoc on the map!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Ryzen 3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 480+, Radeon HD 7900+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
